name: zephyr
description: A seamless, next-gen social experience built for speed, privacy, and effortless connection.
author: parazeeknova

scripts.postinstall: cd packages/db && pnpm dlx prisma generate
scripts.env:local: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');fs.copyFileSync('.env.example','.env');fs.copyFileSync(path.join('apps','web','.env.example'),path.join('apps','web','.env'));fs.copyFileSync(path.join('packages','db','.env.example'),path.join('packages','db','.env'));console.log('✅ Environment files copied successfully');"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); function rm(dir) { if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { console.log('Deleting ' + dir); fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); } } function findAndDelete(folder) { const walk = (dir) => { const files = fs.readdirSync(dir); files.forEach(file => { const fullPath = path.join(dir, file); if (fs.statSync(fullPath).isDirectory()) { if (file === folder) { rm(fullPath); } else { walk(fullPath); } } }); }; walk(process.cwd()); } ['node_modules', '.next', '.turbo'].forEach(findAndDelete); console.log('✅ Cleanup completed');"
scripts.db:up: cd packages/db && pnpm prisma generate && pnpm prisma db push
scripts.docker:clean:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker volume rm zephyr_postgres_data_dev zephyr_redis_data_dev zephyr_minio_data_dev && rm -f .dev-init
